thread.title: Customer IAN THOMAS
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Customer IAN THOMAS

author: Customer IAN THOMAS
title: Customer IAN THOMAS
text: The whole experience was absolutely brilliant from the initial booking - friendly and helpful - to the actual fitting itself. Emails confirmed the arrangements made and the fitter arrived bang on time and carried out the job swiftly in a very efficient and friendly fashion. It is so pleasing to know that a professional service is still available in these work-shy and cynical days. The highest compliment I could pay this firm is that they are far too punctual and helpful to be plumbers. Please don't get me started on plumbers
